name: Canterz Paranormies 2
description:
Canterz Paranormies 2 is a 2D Top Down survival horror game based on the story of the most renowned paranormal investigation team of the US called "Canterz Paranormies" who got a request to investigate the house located in Kentucky, which is haunted by the spirits of the cemetery located a few miles away from the property.



The Paranormal investigation team got a call from Jun, the owner of the Kentucky house, with a request to investigate her property. She said that an Evil spirit followed her home from the cemetery which she visited a few weeks ago for attending a funeral of one of her close relatives who passed away recently. A day after she returned home from the graveyard the paranormal activities started to pick up. Every day, she experienced the various paranormal activities like seeing dark apparitions, furniture moving on their own, unexplained banging noises, disembodied growling and laughing sounds, and foul smell coming from the basement area.

She was feeling uneasy living in her own home and desperately needed help in order to get rid of this entity from her house. On top of that, she was really concerned for the safety of her family and her kids. So, she asked the 'Canterz Paranormies' team to investigate her home for the paranormal evidence and assist her to get rid of the dark entity for good.

You play as James, the lead paranormal investigator of the 'Canterz Paranormies' team and your mission is to help her out at all costs! Are you ready to accept the challenge?

Key Features:


  • Explore the entire Kentucky haunted house!
  • Use the various kinds of scientific equipment like Rem pod, SLS, Night vision cameras etc.
  • Lots of Evil spirits lurking in the shadows.
  • Explore the Spirit world, cemetery and basement area!
  • Nearly half an hour of paranormal investigation!



Note: I am a solo indie game developer and I have done all of the graphics, artwork, animation, character design, and programming except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.
